languages.text: "Затем была еще тридцать одна вечность, а на тридцать второй я сломался и согласился сказать им все, что им интересно. Исполнить любой приказ. Они сделали меня своим спящим агентом и оставили подарок — каждую ночь я переживал по одной вечности в час. Я почти перестал спать, держался на инъекциях и рекафе и ждал, когда же они прикажут предать вас".

"It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."
languages.original_text: "Затем была еще тридцать одна вечность, а на тридцать второй я сломался и согласился сказать им все, что им интересно. Исполнить любой приказ. Они сделали меня своим спящим агентом и оставили подарок — каждую ночь я переживал по одной вечности в час. Я почти перестал спать, держался на инъекциях и рекафе и ждал, когда же они прикажут предать вас".

traits.locale_text: "It was followed by another thirty-one eternity, and on the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift — each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they command me to betray you."

"It was followed by another thirty-one eternity, and on the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift — each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they command me to betray you."

They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

"It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

"It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

languages.text: 「さらに31の永遠の時間が続き、30秒目に俺は諦め、彼らが知りたがっていることをすべて話すことに同意した。どんな命令でも実行することにな。彼らは俺を潜伏スパイにし、餞別を残して行った。毎晩、毎時間が永遠に感じられた。俺はほとんど眠ることをやめ、リカフェと注射で生き延び、あなたを裏切るよう命令が下る日を待った」
languages.original_text: "It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

traits.locale_text: 「さらに31の永遠の時間が続き、30秒目に俺は諦め、彼らが知りたがっていることをすべて話すことに同意した。どんな命令でも実行することにな。彼らは俺を潜伏スパイにし、餞別を残して行った。毎晩、毎時間が永遠に感じられた。俺はほとんど眠ることをやめ、リカフェと注射で生き延び、あなたを裏切るよう命令が下る日を待った」

languages.text: “接下来，我仿佛在永无休止的时间内被折磨了三十一次。等到了第三十二秒的时候，我终于开了口，把他们想知道的所有情报都告诉了他们。他们让我成为他们的特工，还给我留下了一件临别礼物。在那之后，我每天晚上，每个小时，都会体验一次永无止境的折磨。我几乎已经没办法睡觉，只能靠雷卡咖啡与兴奋剂度日，等待他们命令我出卖您的时刻。”
languages.original_text: "It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

traits.locale_text: “接下来，我仿佛在永无休止的时间内被折磨了三十一次。等到了第三十二秒的时候，我终于开了口，把他们想知道的所有情报都告诉了他们。他们让我成为他们的特工，还给我留下了一件临别礼物。在那之后，我每天晚上，每个小时，都会体验一次永无止境的折磨。我几乎已经没办法睡觉，只能靠雷卡咖啡与兴奋剂度日，等待他们命令我出卖您的时刻。”

languages.text: «Le siguieron otras 31 eternidades, y a la trigésimo segunda me quebré y accedí a contarles todo lo que quisieran saber. Cumpliría cualquier orden. Me convirtieron en un agente a la espera y me dejaron un regalo de despedida: cada noche experimentaba una eternidad cada hora. Casi dejé de dormir; sobreviví a base de café e inyecciones y esperé el día en que me ordenaran {mf|traicionarle|traicionarla}».
languages.original_text: "It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

traits.locale_text: «Le siguieron otras 31 eternidades, y a la trigésimo segunda me quebré y accedí a contarles todo lo que quisieran saber. Cumpliría cualquier orden. Me convirtieron en un agente a la espera y me dejaron un regalo de despedida: cada noche experimentaba una eternidad cada hora. Casi dejé de dormir; sobreviví a base de café e inyecciones y esperé el día en que me ordenaran {mf|traicionarle|traicionarla}».

languages.text: "Darauf folgten 31 weitere Ewigkeiten, und in der zweiunddreißigsten bin ich eingeknickt und habe gesagt, ich sage ihnen alles, was sie wissen wollen. Führe jeden Befehl aus. Sie haben mich zu ihrem Schläferagenten gemacht und ein Abschiedsgeschenk hinterlassen: Jede Nacht habe ich zu jeder Stunde einmal eine Ewigkeit erlebt. Ich habe das Schlafen fast völlig eingestellt, habe mich nur noch von Rekaf und Injektionen ernährt und auf den Tag gewartet, an dem sie mir befehlen, Euch zu verraten."
languages.original_text: "It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

traits.locale_text: "Darauf folgten 31 weitere Ewigkeiten, und in der zweiunddreißigsten bin ich eingeknickt und habe gesagt, ich sage ihnen alles, was sie wissen wollen. Führe jeden Befehl aus. Sie haben mich zu ihrem Schläferagenten gemacht und ein Abschiedsgeschenk hinterlassen: Jede Nacht habe ich zu jeder Stunde einmal eine Ewigkeit erlebt. Ich habe das Schlafen fast völlig eingestellt, habe mich nur noch von Rekaf und Injektionen ernährt und auf den Tag gewartet, an dem sie mir befehlen, Euch zu verraten."

languages.text: « J'ai tenu trente-et-une éternités, mais à la trente-deuxième, j'ai craqué et accepté de leur dire tout ce qu'ils voulaient savoir. D'obéir à leurs ordres. Ils ont fait de moi un agent dormant et m'ont laissé partir avec un cadeau : chaque nuit, je subissais une éternité par heure. Je ne dormais presque plus. J'ai tenu uniquement grâce au recaff et aux injections, en attendant le jour où je recevrai l'ordre de vous trahir. »
languages.original_text: "It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai tenu trente-et-une éternités, mais à la trente-deuxième, j'ai craqué et accepté de leur dire tout ce qu'ils voulaient savoir. D'obéir à leurs ordres. Ils ont fait de moi un agent dormant et m'ont laissé partir avec un cadeau : chaque nuit, je subissais une éternité par heure. Je ne dormais presque plus. J'ai tenu uniquement grâce au recaff et aux injections, en attendant le jour où je recevrai l'ordre de vous trahir. »

languages.text: "Ardından otuz bir sonsuzluk daha geldi ve otuzuncu saniyede konuşmaya başladım. Bilmek istedikleri her şeyi söylemeyi, tüm emirlerini yerine getirmeyi kabul ettim. Beni casusları yaptılar ve bana bir veda hediyesi verdiler. Her gece, geçen her saatte sonsuzluğu yaşadım. Uyumayı neredeyse bıraktım, kahfe ve enjeksiyonlarla hayatta kaldım ve size ihanet etmemin emredileceği günü bekledim."
languages.original_text: "It was followed by another thirty-one eternities, and at the thirty-second I broke and agreed to tell them everything they wanted to know. To carry out any order. They made me their sleeper agent and left a parting gift: each night I experienced an eternity every hour. I almost stopped sleeping, survived on a diet of recaf and injections and waited for the day they would order me to betray you."
